channel.title: WarTusk | Under Development | RS Based | New Game Design |
channel.description:
[b]Last time thread was edited - 8/31/2015[/b]
[b]Apology to those who downloaded the last client: Please Read if you got a message from me:[/b] [spoiler]I am sorry to whoever downloaded the last client I sent to people through Via: Private Messaging.
My Computer broke and I lost my whole project while trying to host it publicly. I had to wait to get a knew computer before letting you all know what happened. I am very sorry for any inconvenience downloading it could have brought. I will not be spamming your inbox any more with messages of updates of the server. I just wanted to update you for what all happened before.
I have started the project over and added more classes and abilities for the player base! I hope you continue to follow the project and reply with any suggestions/questions you may have!
-WarTusk
[/spoiler] [center][img]http://i.imgur.com/iI0D9P9.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/sQG7sJY.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/j1h66vf.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/faelRPn.png[/img][[b]Warriors Combat and abilities:[/b][img]http://i.imgur.com/faelRPn.png[/img][ [spoiler] [b]Warriors Basic Attacks[/b] [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VjN-E6w2G1Y[/youtube]
[b]Warriors Charge[/b] [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nEtTMrRlktg[/youtube]
Warriors Stun & Bruising: Bruising will take out half of the targets life and stun them leaving them vulnerable for burst damage. [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l4shK5txdNM&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
[/spoiler]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/gk8gmt4.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/AcF2839.png[/img][b]Mages Combat and abilities:[/b][img]http://i.imgur.com/AcF2839.png[/img] [spoiler] [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vrLbMHQ6Zmo[/youtube]
[/spoiler]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/2drCYoo.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Hrglt5E.png[/img][b]Hunters Combat and abilities:[/b][img]http://i.imgur.com/Hrglt5E.png[/img] [spoiler] [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Umtm4v_gdUU[/youtube]
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Fnxec1LyPxY[/youtube] [/spoiler]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/vmqTf8O.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4eUlrP4.png[/img][b]Druids Combat and abilities:[/b][img]http://i.imgur.com/4eUlrP4.png[/img] [spoiler]
Showing some forms: [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l4esBRtWIjE&feature=youtu.be[/youtube] [/spoiler]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/0tuHvFj.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/cDVNTas.png[/img][b]Priests Combat and abilities:[/b][img]http://i.imgur.com/cDVNTas.png[/img] [spoiler] Resurrection: [youtube]https://youtu.be/qOxatSCwS-w[/youtube]
[/spoiler]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/gr6VhsQ.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/u6laaLu.png[/img][b]Rogues Combat and abilities:[/b][img]http://i.imgur.com/u6laaLu.png[/img] [spoiler] Showing Stealth: And other promo content :) [u][b][VIDEO DOES WORK] [/b][/u][youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aPhy14-56T4&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
[/spoiler]
[b]Recent Updates - Last Updated - 8/31/2015[/b] [spoiler] Finished Rogue Abilities Finished Warriors Abilities Finished Hunters Abilities Finished Priest Abilities Finished Druid Abilities Finished New Loot System (Class Specified) Finished New Home Layout Finished (Toggled Class Interfaces)
Example of interface: [spoiler] For beta I decided to just use the Pest Control Interface.
Edit: Just finished the third line of the interface "CD's". Once your cool downs are free that whole line will disappear.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/LLFIg3L.png[/img] [/spoiler]
[/spoiler]
[u][b]Future Steps/Goals - Last Updated - 8/29/2015[/b][/u] [spoiler]
[u][b]Red = What needs to be finished[/b][/u]
Mages abilities
Add skill requirements for each abilities
Clean up Druids rotation
Clean up boss fights/mechanics
Add right clicking interactions with players (Only right clicking action completed are for Priests when they use 'Resurrection')
Add combat system for you to earn and spend your (Energy, Mana, And Rage)
Add item bonuses. EX:(If you wear this magic amulet it gives you +50 mana) <----might take a while
[color=green]Will add more with progression of project [/color]
[/spoiler]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/tgqtL7F.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/eJ2yGUP.png[/img]
[/center]

item.title: WarTusk | Under Development | RS Based | New Game Design |
item.dc:creator: @WarTusk-RSPS WarTusk-RSPS
item.description:
@WarTusk-RSPS wrote:

bandos beast:

Is this still in progress? If so, when will we be expecting a beta?

Sarwar:

Hoping this goes much better, should be dope!

Thanks for the comments,

It is still in progress, I am cleaning it out a lot. A lot of my coding was very sloppy and rushed so I am trying to clean and polish everything at the moment.
This project has mostly been a learning experience, but I am currently trying to turn it into a enjoyable game.

So the conversion from Learning project <-----> Balanced game is going to take a long time. I will start adding updates on this as much as I can.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @WarTusk-RSPS WarTusk-RSPS
item.description:
@WarTusk-RSPS wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:40, topic:551092”][quote author=WarTusk-RSPS link=topic=670006.msg4495312#msg4495312 date=1441733942]

How come I’ve seen this topic show up 3 different times as unread, but every single time the last post is the same…

I am not sure, I am just adding gifs to my last post of stuff I add to the server
[/quote]
So that’s why this post:

Thanks Paris!

Now says “Today” when it was originally posted a few days ago?
Seems to me like someone keeps deleting their last reply and then adding onto it for bumping…[/quote]

Is that against the rules? If it is a moderator can remove this post and I can make a new thread if they have to. I dont really give a damn about views or replies or bumping especially for just a showoff thread, that’s just always how I have done my updates just copy and past the last reply and add another gif or update into it and repost. Just a habit I suppose. Thanks for letting me know though.

Read full topic

Apology to those who downloaded the last client: Please Read if you got a message from me:

My Computer broke and I lost my whole project while trying to host it publicly. I had to wait to get a knew computer before letting you all know what happened. I am very sorry for any inconvenience downloading it could have brought. I will not be spamming your inbox any more with messages of updates of the server. I have started the project over and added more classes and abilities for the player base! I hope you continue to follow the project and reply with any suggestions/questions you may have!

Add combat system for you to earn and spend your (Energy, Mana, And Rage)

Add item bonuses. EX:(If you wear this magic amulet it gives you +50 mana) <----might take a while

[color=green]Will add more with progression of project [/color]

[/spoiler]

[/center][/quote]

This looks pretty cool!

item.title: WarTusk | Under Development | RS Based | New Game Design |
item.dc:creator: @WarTusk-RSPS WarTusk-RSPS
item.description:
@WarTusk-RSPS wrote:

RandQm:

You pm advertising piece of shit

I posted a comment on this thread for people to download my client and test it out a while back. I did not know who all tried to download the broken client so I sent messages to everyone who has previously posted/replied to this thread or who has shown interest in my project. Sadly my PC Broke and I lost the whole project. So I wanted to update/message everyone so they knew what happened, and to apologize for the inconvenience of downloading the broken client.

I am sorry for messaging you if it brought any inconvenience to you. I just wanted people to know what is going on.

On the top of the first page I do have a summary of what all happened for those I Messaged.

Sorry again,

Edit: Latest Update:

[spoiler]
Toggled class specified interface.

I am just replicating the pest control interface for now.

LLFIg3L.png791×559
[/spoiler]

Read full topic

item.description:
@WarTusk-RSPS wrote:

Thanks for the continued support and feedback everybody! I am almost done having this ready for public release! Here is a little tour of the skilling and training areas! Please enjoy the video!

I know I have been pushing the release date a lot but I am trying to make this a good and fun experience creating this server so I am just taking my time developing it and coming up with more and more ideas so players can always stay busy and have fun!

Video: [spoiler]“Hey Listen!”
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HabTjmX0Ngc[/youtube]

item.title: WarTusk | Under Development | RS Based | New Game Design |
item.dc:creator: @WarTusk-RSPS WarTusk-RSPS
item.description:
@WarTusk-RSPS wrote:

Thanks for the replies everyone!

Want to get in contact with me?
Pm my inbox/reply to my posts/ skype: loot.share (Name WarTusk RsPs)

People were wondering a little more about the new Well Of Good Fortune. Well here is a small inside look!
Head Phone Users Beware: Video does have music with a loud bam to it.
Video in spoiler:

[spoiler][youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LJiBxpBTcb0&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]

Have ideas for the well of good fortune? Let me know in the comments

More information about the Well Of Good Fortune:
[spoiler]
-After you put 10m into the Well, you can hit the activate button to get a random reward.

-After the well hits 200m (community total), the well will over flow and anyone who has helped put money into the well will get a great global reward!
[/spoiler]

[/spoiler]

furyking50:

Looks great! Can’t wait for beta but ehh weekdays

Can’t wait to see you this coming Tuesday!

sinisoul:

That’s real neato.

Thanks Sinisoul! I am happy you are liking the look of some of the new content!

Read full topic

item.title: WarTusk | Under Development | RS Based | New Game Design |
item.dc:creator: @WarTusk-RSPS WarTusk-RSPS
item.description:
@WarTusk-RSPS wrote:

(long comment, has video included as well so if you are interested in the project please read everything. It contains the goals,deadlines, updates, and beta release date!)
Listen to this while you read.
[spoiler][youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2guzO8CdYZU[/youtube][/spoiler]

I have gotten a few messages saying I was waisting time. And how this is a never-ending development project which will never come online.

You are right this project will be never-ending (development & online wise)

BUT OH BOY ARE YOU WRONG ABOUT THIS NEVER COMING ONLINE!

Information about Beta Testing and release date: [spoiler]This next week beta will be open for the pre-approved Beta Testers “May 5th”(Check back daily for updates on date) . This “Beta” stage is going to last for only 1 week. During this time all of the Beta Testers (and myself) will play the whole game (legitimately). Getting each skill to level 125 and kill each boss countless amount of times and adventure the whole world to make sure that this game is Fair,Stable, And Fun! After the beta stage I will take all of the opinions, and ideas from you (The Players). And make the final changes before opening it up for the public!

Interested in being part of the Beta Testing? Click This Link: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,670188.msg4481505.html#msg4481505[/spoiler]

Recent Updates:

[spoiler]
-Finished class training (Each class gets specific abilities. The requirements to learn these abilities are… “Correct Class, Prestige Level, And Gametime Played”)

-Finished special events. (Random party tokens that drop at a super low drop rate [If you prestige you get a token] these tokens can be used with Party Pete Jr. which will make everyone in WarTusk Party! And activate a global 30 minutes of double XP! (shows in video))

-Finished Account safety. (upon login after you enter your password before you can play you must enter a 4 digit pin to activate your game playing session! If you get it wrong 3 times in a row you are jailed and a staff member will assist with the problem. For future reference remember to use ::hint (yourhint) so create an account hint. This is so staff members can look up your hint (“recovery question”) to verify you are the account owner.

-Finished Custom Bossing Mechanics: (EX: During the fight with “Legion” you and your team must correlate when and where to click objects and pull switches and drink potions. During Legion it will start to burst you with tons of damage you have to drink your potion in order to get invulnerability from his attacks during that stage. Or you will be slaughtered.)

-Finished Money Well Of Good Fortune: Players throughout WarTusk can throw items and gold into the Money Well Of Good Fortune! It collects the “Total” amount of how much has been put into it and when it reaches a amount of gold it will reward everyone in the community with random rewards! [EX: Global Balloon Party, 2xp, 3xp, Increased Droprate, A Burst of loyalty points, party token, rares (party hats, scythes, masks, customization items), discounts in stores, boosted stats, xp lamps, random companions, or even a chance where it just throws all of your money back out and deposits it into your bank) But the odds are in your favor!

[/spoiler]

Here is a small video of the home area! Sorry for it going at a fast pace! Upload time takes forever so I made it snappy. You can check more out when it is released!

[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rp97DnmuwEw&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]

Lil_Smok3r:

Love the sub-mastery skills idea!

I’m glad you like the idea! I have just finished with all of them and I will release a video for the public when beta opens this next week!

Project Territh:

I love it, keep up the good work.

Thank You!

sertan8:

honestly this is really nicely done. keep it up! if this server ever gets online i’d play it

Well I am looking for a few more beta testers if you are interested please let me know!

Read full topic
item.source: WarTusk | Under Development | RS Based | New Game Design |
